There are two issues here:
1. I broke subclasses of AbstractDecoratedTextEditor which create their own
   source viewer but do not provide an overview ruler (see bug 209645)

2. the snippet editor does not correctly initialize its source viewer:
   - no overview ruler
   - no decoration support (e.g. no squiggles in the text area)

The main problems IAE and NPE are fixed in HEAD but I suggest to fix the editor as well.
